Package VIEW

Class ColorPrint

java.lang.Object
VIEW.ColorPrint
public class ColorPrint extends Object
Class that represents the code strings to print colorized details.

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Field

    static final String
    D_BLUE

    static final String
    RESET
    The string to reset the text to his default color.
